name: TouchCon
description: What is the project about? C2E Platform (User Advertising Compensation Platform) What makes your project unique? By inventing C2E (Consumer to Earn) service in 2021, We are developing and servicing apps in 2022, and continuing to develop in 2023. Whatâ€™s next for your project?
